name: Precognition (Psykopath)
description:
An unplayable turn-based strategy where you have to overcome an alien's invasion.

It is made from scratch with the SFML library in C++. Unfortunately, I lacked time this week... So here's my mediocre prototype to at least make a contribution for this jam.

Credits :

  • Icons by CharlesGabriel (Source)
  • Font by Codeman38
